attributes.action: Not go ahead with proposed logging of every email and phone call
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to stop the ludicrous act of logging every single email and phone made throughout the UK.  Like most of this governments ideas, they are fatally flawed and would do more damage than good.  They must be stopped from eroding our rights to freedom!  Stand up UK and fight this ridiculous idea!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
